name: Disharmony (itch)
description:
"In the Never it's colder than ever."

Disharmony is an interactive, story-driven game where your choices directly affect the events as they unfold. Told via an online messenger app called Harmony, it explores conversations between the people you trust the most. Or do you?

Following the mysterious disappearance of a friend, you're compelled to put your loyalties to the test and bring the facts to light.

Are you prepared to face the consequences of your decisions? Will you be able to uncover the truth? Can you save her?

This haunting journey into the unknown will leave you questioning who your friends really are and what truly lies beyond the veil.

"Can anyone hear me?"
  • A developing story line which offers different options based on your decisions.

  • Multiple possible endings.

  • Easily accessible for those who enjoy unhurried, plot-sensitive games.

  • Over 26,000 words of interactive storytelling.

  • Based in a contemporary setting familiar to users of desktop messenger services, creating an intimate and relatable experience.
"Please help me."

Disharmony began as an exercise in prototyping and while it is a finished product, there may still be some unpolished design elements. Thank you for understanding.
